resources.string: Play timer sound in silent or vibration mode
The time that elapses before starting the next timer
Use media volume when headphones are connected

When a headset is connected, the individual alarm volume is ignored, and the alarm sound is output according to the default media volume of the phone\n\nIt is recommended to enable this option as it may surprise you when the volume suddenly changes whilst playing music
Default time when adding a new timer
The default time when adding a new timer to a board
